name: nlpcloud/nlpcloud-client
description: NLP Cloud serves high performance pre-trained or custom models for NER, sentiment-analysis, classification, summarization, question answering, and POS tagging, ready for production, served through a REST API. This is the PHP client for the API. More details here: https://nlpcloud.io. Documentation: https://docs.nlpcloud.io. Github: https://github.com/nlpcloud/nlpcloud-php
